parsed.title: Do santo medieval ao brinquedo de plástico: o mito que persiste
parsed.summary: Um boneco infantil nas prateleiras de lojas hoje carrega a mesma pose de um menino martirizado em 1475. A imagem nasceu de uma xilogravura impressa pelos primeiros livros, usada por um bispo para acusar judeus e confiscar suas propriedades. Milênios depois, a mesma figura circula em massa como brinquedo barato, mantendo viva uma lenda sem explicação. O que realmente transforma um símbolo de fé em mercadoria?

scenes.narration: Um menino santo, morto séculos atrás, agora veste plástico nas prateleiras de brinquedo.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a cheap plastic doll resembling a medieval saint, standing on a dimly lit store shelf, soft shadows, muted earth tones
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the doll, subtle sway of the plastic figure, dust particles drifting in faint light
scenes.audioDescription: ambient store hum with distant echo, faint footsteps

scenes.narration: A figura vem de uma xilogravura de 1493, distribuída pelos primeiros livros impressos.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a 1493 woodcut of a child martyr on aged parchment, candlelight flickering, deep shadows accentuating ink lines
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle zoom in on the illustration, parchment fibers subtly drifting
scenes.audioDescription: soft candle crackle, distant low chant

scenes.narration: O bispo usou a gravura para acusar judeus, confiscando suas casas e fortunas.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a stern bishop in ornate robes examining the woodcut, a ledger of seized Jewish assets on the desk, candlelight casting ominous shadows
scenes.motionDescription: Slow pan right across the desk, ledger pages fluttering softly
scenes.audioDescription: quill scratching on parchment, muted organ drone

scenes.narration: Hoje, a mesma pose aparece em bonecos baratos, espalhando a lenda sem explicação.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, industrial assembly line producing plastic dolls bearing the medieval pose, cold fluorescent light, shadows of machinery looming
scenes.motionDescription: Conveyor belt moving, doll rotating slowly, subtle steam rising

scenes.narration: A verdade permanece oculta, mas a história continua aqui. The Gap Files.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, stark black screen with faint glowing text 'The Gap Files' centered, subtle mist swirling around
scenes.motionDescription: Text fade in with a soft pulse, slight mist drift
scenes.audioDescription: low ambient drone fading into silence

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
